C_0001: Fuel cells are one of the promising energy-conversion devices due to their high efficiency and zero emission.

C_0002: Although recent advances in electrocatalysts have been achieved using various material designs such as alloys, core@shell structures, and shape control, many issues still remain to be resolved.
